monster.name: Cat

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 320, Curse of Strahd, Hoard of the Dragon Queen, Storm King's Thunder, Tomb of Annihilation, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden, Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
